page.title: 16SOME SHOPS IN HANSLOPE
page.content: THERE IS A PAPER SHOP, A WINE SHOP AND A POST OFFICE IN HANSLOPE.THE PAPER SHOP IS OPEN FROM MON-SUN AND THE OPENING TIMES ARE MON-FRI 6.30-10.30 AM AND 3.30-6.00 PM, SAT AND SUN 8-12 NOON THE POST OFFICE IS OPEN FROM MON-FRI. MON AND TUES 9-5.30 PM, WED 9-1.00PM AND THURS,FRI 9-5.00PM.THEY BOTH SELL TOYS AND THE PAPER SHOP SELLS NEWS- PAPERS, SWEETS AND TOBACCO.THE POST OFFICE SELLS CARDS, SWEETS AND POSTAGE STUFF.THE WINE SHOP IS OPEN FROM TUES TO SUN AND ITS OPENING TIMES ARE NOON TO 9 PM, SAT 10 AM-9 PM AND SUN 12-2 PM IT SELLS WINES, BEERS SPIRITS AND DELICAATESSEN FOODS AND SWEETS.THE OWNERS ARE TRYING TO SELL THE SHOP BECAUSE THEY ARE NOT DOING ENOUGH BUSINESS.
